Package au.gov.naa.digipres.xena.util

Class Summary
AbstractJdomDeNormaliser Allows denormalisation using JDOM.
AbstractJdomNormaliser JDOM Normalisers may find it convenient to use this abstract class.
BinaryDeNormaliser Denormalise a Xena package that contains base64 encoded data.
ByteArrayURLConnection Simulates a URLConnection from a byte array rather than the real genuine location of the data.
ChunkedView A view that can display an XML document in chunks to avoid loading it all into memory at the same time.
FileAndDirectorySelectionPanel  
FilenameEncoder Handling spaces in URLs is a particularly messy and gruesome business and has caused untold strife.
GlassPane This is the glass pane class that intercepts screen interactions during system busy states.
InputStreamEncoder This class provides a static method for encoding an input stream into base64, giving all plugins a single, common method for doing so.
JdomUtil General utility functions for converting between JDOM and SAX xml streams.
JdomXenaView Super-class for views which wish to manipulate the XML as a JDOM tree.
PrintableTextArea TextArea with print functionality.
ProgressDialog  
SourceURIParser  
TableSorter TableSorter is a decorator for TableModels; adding sorting functionality to a supplied TableModel.
TagContentFinder  
TempFileWriter  
TextView Base class for views of text.
UrlEncoder Handling spaces in URLs is a particularly messy and gruesome business and has caused untold strife.
XMLCharacterValidator  
XmlContentHandlerSplitter A simple splitter Content handler that splits an incoming SAX xml stream into an arbitrary number of outgoing streams for multiple processing.
XmlDeNormaliser
